title: Average price for a soak-off gel application in nail salons in the U.S. 2010 to 2016
summary: In general Average price in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Average price in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2011 to 2013, and lastly roughly constant from 2013 to 2014.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
The highest Average price in U.S. dollars, of value 36.64 was reached at Year 2014
Minimum Average price in U.S. dollars about 28.93 was reached at Year 2012
